Constructor Detail

PastryGateway

public PastryGateway(java.lang.String localAddress,
                     int localPort,
                     java.lang.String remoteAddress,
                     int remotePort)
              throws java.lang.Exception
This constructor sets up a PastryNode. It will bootstrap to an existing ring if it can find one at the specified location, otherwise it will start a new ring.

Parameters:
localAddress - the local address to bind to
localPort - the local port to bind to
remoteAddress - the IP address of the node to boot from
remotePort - IP port of the node to boot from
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

publish

public void publish(CURI source,
                    URI subject,
                    java.io.Serializable msg)
Description copied from interface: ICommGateway
PRIME implements the Publish/Subscribe communication paradigm. Specifically, this method publishes a given message to a specific topic

Specified by:
publish in interface ICommGateway
Parameters:
source - the CURI of the source node
subject - the topic of the message. Note that a topic is identified by a URI.
msg - the message to be published

public void subscribe(URI subject)
Description copied from interface: ICommGateway
PRIME implements the Publish/Subscribe communication paradigm. Specifically, this method subscribes the current node for a topic of interest

Specified by:
subscribe in interface ICommGateway
Parameters:
subject - the subject of interest
